channel.title: Anyone else find goat horns profitable?
channel.description: This past week i was hacked, so i decided i'd find a new way to make about 2mill in a day, so i decided to look at goat horns, and then i looked at goat horn dust which was even more cash. So i decided, what if i grinded the goat horn down to the dust and sell them, so i had a spare 100k left, spent it on the goat horns, got a bot, and then now making 200k/hr+ decided hey it was a good profitable experience, so ill be doing this for a few days, they sell pretty quick at 466gp each and you can buy the horns at lower than 410 gp each, because i put in at 410 and get a decent amount back as people sell them for like -5%. If anyone else has a good profitable experience please post it as there are other merchanters around looking for new profit experiences. Just figured id post this.
